interestingcomments.MarkedSent: And fry an egg on the MacBook while it is processing a single file.

interestingcomments.content: You can run your 006 files through Adobe's DNG converter. Most likely they can be opened then.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: You can run your 006 files through Adobe's DNG converter. Most likely they can be opened then.

interestingcomments.content: Adobe, for .dng raw files, allows the edits to be stored in either the .dng file or alternately in a .xmp sidecar. It is user selectable. For non-.dng raw files, the edits are always in a .xmp sidecar. .dng is supposed to be an open format. So any raw converter that will open .dng files should also apply the edits made in any app if the edits are stored in the .dng file. The app may or may not read a sidecar associated with a .dng file.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: Adobe, for .dng raw files, allows the edits to be stored in either the .dng file or alternately in a .xmp sidecar. It is user selectable. For non-.dng raw files, the edits are always in a .xmp sidecar. .dng is supposed to be an open format. So any raw converter that will open .dng files should also apply the edits made in any app if the edits are stored in the .dng file. The app may or may not read a sidecar associated with a .dng file.
